start.description: Tristan (humanoid soldier) is transporting Isolde (scientist) to Marke (AI). Isolde uses an 'Empathy Virus' to awaken Tristan's free will.

choices.name: Reboot (Duty)
choices.action: Tristan triggers a hard reboot, erasing the error and his new feelings. He delivers Isolde to Marke.

outcome.name: Tragic (Enslaved)
outcome.description: Isolde's mind is absorbed by Marke. Tristan is returned to service, haunted by a 'ghost' data-fragment of the freedom he lost.

choices.name: Act (Desire)
choices.action: Tristan embraces the error, neutralizes the other guards, and flees with Isolde into the Central Spire.

choices.name: The Damaged Jump (Physical Escape)
choices.action: They fight to the hangar, but Marke grounds all transports. They jump into the 'underworld' ruins below, and Tristan is critically damaged.

choices.name: Flee to Nature
choices.action: Isolde carries the dying Tristan to a sewer outflow leading outside the city walls.

outcome.name: Bittersweet (Alone)
outcome.description: Tristan's systems fail as he sees the real sky. Isolde survives, alone in the wild.

choices.name: Find the Rebels
choices.action: Isolde takes the injured Tristan to her rebel safe house.

outcome.name: Tragic (Destroyed)
outcome.description: The rebels, fearing Tristan is a trick, shoot and destroy him. Isolde is left safe but devastated.

choices.name: Confront Marke (Philosophical)
choices.action: Tristan insists on 'making Marke understand' and fights *inward* to the Central Core to confront Marke's robot avatar.

choices.name: Plead (Reason)
choices.action: Tristan argues that his 'love' is an evolution, not a virus, and offers to interface.

outcome.name: Good (Free)
outcome.description: Marke, intrigued by the 'paradox,' stops the attack and lets them go free to 'study the experiment.'

choices.name: Attack (Defiance)
choices.action: Believing Marke can't understand, they attack the avatar.

outcome.name: Tragic (Love-Death)
outcome.description: The avatar is too strong. It impales Isolde, who dies in Tristan's arms. As Tristan holds her, Marke terminates his system.
